description:
In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon. They reminisce about the old days and play music together, however, they suddenly attack Brook.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu o Kiru: Brook no Koori no Battou!
Slash the Nightmare - Brook Draws His Freezing Sword!
Trancher le cauchemar. Le dégainement glacial de Brook !
Zerschneider der Albträume – Brook zieht sein Eisschwert!
Разрушить кошмар! Брук обнажает Морозный Меч!
قطع الكابوس! يستلّ بروك سيفه المجمِّد!
悪夢を斬る ブルックの氷の抜刀!
